input_args.messages:
[{'role': 'system', 'content': 'choose an appropriate tool to use to answer the following thought based on the following tools:
add:Add two numbers.

Args:
    a: First number to add
    b: Second number to add
multiply:Multiply two numbers.

Args:
    x: First number to multiply
    y: Second number to multiply
divide:Divide two numbers.

Args:
    numerator: Number to divide
    denominator: Number to divide by'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is 5 plus 3?'}]
input_args.response_schema: {'$defs': {'addInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'a': {'description': 'First number to add', 'title': 'A', 'type': 'integer'}, 'b': {'default': 0, 'description': 'Second number to add', 'title': 'B', 'type': 'integer'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'add', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['a', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'addInput', 'type': 'object'}, 'divideInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'numerator': {'description': 'Number to divide', 'title': 'Numerator', 'type': 'integer'}, 'denominator': {'description': 'Number to divide by', 'title': 'Denominator', 'type': 'integer'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'divide', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['numerator', 'denominator', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'divideInput', 'type': 'object'}, 'multiplyInput': {'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'x': {'description': 'First number to multiply', 'title': 'X', 'type': 'integer'}, 'y': {'description': 'Second number to multiply', 'title': 'Y', 'type': 'integer'}, 'tool_name': {'const': 'multiply', 'description': 'The name of the function to call', 'title': 'Tool Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['x', 'y', 'tool_name'], 'title': 'multiplyInput', 'type': 'object'}}, 'properties': {'tool_input': {'discriminator': {'mapping': {'add': '#/$defs/addInput', 'divide': '#/$defs/divideInput', 'multiply': '#/$defs/multiplyInput'}, 'propertyName': 'tool_name'}, 'oneOf': [{'$ref': '#/$defs/addInput'}, {'$ref': '#/$defs/multiplyInput'}, {'$ref': '#/$defs/divideInput'}], 'title': 'Tool Input'}}, 'required': ['tool_input'], 'title': 'ToolsInput', 'type': 'object'}
